name: Tellus (AarniTuli)
description: You are a brave terraformer who has been sent to Earth after a global ecological catastrophe turned it into a wasteland. Your job is to plant some trees, flowers and grass and make the planet look nice again. But there is a problem. The Earth is now infested with robot vacuum cleaners that have gone haywire. They think you are dirt and they want to suck you up. You must use your wits, weapons and gadgets to dodge, blast and trick the evil vacuums and save the world. Are you ready for the ultimate cleaning challenge?
